## Description

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security fix

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`pytest`)
- [ ] My changes pass static analysis (`ruff check .`, `mypy src`)

## Safety Check

- [ ] I confirm this change **does not** perform any AWS write operations without explicit user opt-in flags.
- [ ] I confirm this change **does not** exfiltrate data to external servers.
